Home.title: Welcome to my website. I’m happy that you found your way here!
Home.subText: Hanna Komes is an applied sports psychologist specializing in mental training and psychological support to optimize athletic performance. Her tailored approaches help athletes overcome barriers, boost resilience, and achieve long-term success.
Home.subtitle: What is sports psychology?
Home.mainText: Sports psychological training fosters optimal collaboration between the body and mind to elevate athletic performance. With targeted, individualized, and evidence-based methods, sports psychology proves to be a valuable complement to any sport.

About.title: About me
About.content1: I grew up participating in sports like gymnastics, hockey, track and field, and tennis. When I discovered CrossFit in 2016, it's versatility resonated with me as it incorporated elements from my previous athletic experience. Since 2019, I have been guiding individuals towards their personal goals as a CrossFit coach.
About.content2: As a psychologist (B. Sc.) and sports psychologist (M. Sc.), I am committed to a holistic approach when supporting athletes, coaches, and teams both within the realm of sports and beyond.
About.content3: Since the beginning of 2024, I have been listed in the expert bank of the Arbeitsgemeinschaft für Sportpsychologie in Deutschland e.V., the standard for Sports psychology expertise in Germany, accepted by the German Olympic Sports Confederation (DOSB).
About.subtitle: My philosophy
About.philosophy: When working together, my priority is to stimulate shifts in perspective, foster growth, and facilitate development. This happens through a co-creative process where both sides actively contribute. Central to this dynamic is the establishment of trust and the assurance of confidentiality.
